BILLY Bookcase.name: BILLY Bookcase
BILLY Bookcase.description: A white 6-shelf bookcase with laminated plywood.

issues.solution: Redistribute the weight evenly across the shelves. If the issue persists, we can schedule a repair.
Ensure all components are tightly secured and the unit is on a level floor. Use wall anchors for added stability if necessary.

POÄNG Armchair.name: POÄNG Armchair
POÄNG Armchair.description: A bentwood armchair with a light-colored cushion.

issues.issue: Cushion cover is torn or stained.
issues.solution: We can schedule a replacement for the cushion cover. Would you like to proceed?

issues.issue: The wooden frame is creaking loudly.
issues.solution: First, try tightening all the bolts on the frame. If the creaking continues, a technician may need to inspect it.

issues.issue: The table surface has deep scratches or chips.
issues.solution: For deep scratches, we can schedule a technician to perform a surface repair.

issues.issue: One of the legs is loose.
issues.solution: Please try to re-tighten the leg. If it does not secure properly, it may need to be replaced.

MARKUS Office Chair.name: MARKUS Office Chair
MARKUS Office Chair.description: A high-back ergonomic office chair with black mesh.

issues.issue: The gas lift cylinder is failing (chair won't stay up).
issues.solution: The gas lift mechanism likely needs to be replaced. We can schedule a technician to do this for you.

issues.issue: The caster wheels are stuck or not rolling smoothly.
issues.solution: Please check the wheels for tangled hair or debris. If cleaning them doesn't solve the issue, we can send you a replacement set of casters.

INGOLF Dining Chair.name: INGOLF Dining Chair
INGOLF Dining Chair.description: A traditional solid wood dining chair in a white finish.

issues.issue: One or more legs are wobbly.
issues.solution: Try tightening the screws connecting the legs to the seat base. If a leg remains wobbly, the joint may be stripped and require repair.

issues.issue: The paint is chipping or flaking.
issues.solution: For minor chips, we can provide a touch-up paint kit. For widespread flaking, we may need to replace the chair.

MALM Bed Frame.name: MALM Bed Frame
MALM Bed Frame.description: A queen-sized bed frame with a simple, modern design.

issues.issue: The wooden slats are slipping out of place or have broken.
issues.solution: We can provide replacement slats and plastic end caps. Ensure the central support beam is secure to prevent recurring issues.

issues.issue: The headboard feels loose or makes noise.
issues.solution: Please check and tighten the bolts connecting the headboard to the side rails. If the issue persists, a support bracket may be needed.

MICKE Desk.name: MICKE Desk
MICKE Desk.description: A compact white desk with a drawer and a cabinet.

issues.issue: The drawer does not open or close smoothly.
issues.solution: Check that the drawer runners are correctly aligned and free of obstructions. Applying a small amount of lubricant can also help.

issues.issue: The desk surface laminate is peeling at the edges.
issues.solution: This is considered wear and tear, but if it's significant, we can schedule a technician to assess it for repair or replacement.

KIVIK Sofa.name: KIVIK Sofa
KIVIK Sofa.description: A 3-seat gray fabric sofa with deep, comfortable seating.

issues.issue: The seat cushions have lost their shape or feel flat.
issues.solution: Try fluffing and rotating the cushions regularly. If they are permanently compressed, we can look into replacing the foam inserts.

issues.issue: The fabric cover is pilling or has faded.
issues.solution: Pilling can be removed with a fabric shaver. If the fading is severe and uneven, we can schedule a replacement for the sofa cover.
